mapper.select: select id, request_id, request_time, response_time, create_time, update_time, tenant_id, operate_type, attr_msg from t_third_access_record where id = #{id}
select id, request_id, request_time, response_time, create_time, update_time, tenant_id, operate_type, attr_msg from t_third_access_record limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into t_third_access_record(request_id, request_time, response_time, create_time, update_time, tenant_id, operate_type, attr_msg) values (#{requestId}, #{requestTime}, #{responseTime}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{tenantId}, #{operateType}, left(#{attrMsg}, 199))
mapper.update:
update t_third_access_record
request_time = #{requestTime},
response_time = #{responseTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
operate_type = #{operateType},
attr_msg = left(#{attrMsg}, 199)
where request_id = #{requestId}
mapper.select: select id, request_id, request_time, response_time, create_time, update_time, tenant_id, operate_type, attr_msg from t_third_access_record where request_id = #{requestId}
